post:
Hi everyone,

For days the die-hard LET member had nothing to do because of an major outage. LET is back online again so that is reason for a lowend party 🎉

We are giving away:
- 3x Premium I VPS for 3 months
- 1x Premium II VPS for 3 months
- 1x Premium III VPS for 3 months

**General specs**

- I9-9900K CPU
- DDR4 RAM
- NVMe storage
- DDoS protected by OVH
- Firewall rule management
- Servers located in The Netherlands (EU)
- Network location: France or Germany

You can find more detailed specs **[here](https://finalhosting.nl/products/vps/premium)**

<hr>

**How do we proceed after 3 months?**
1. You can renew your service with a 30% discount
2. You can downgrade and renew your service with a 30% discount
3. Server will be cancelled automatically

Please also check out our new status page and subscribe for updates on outages or performance issues: https://status.finalhosting.nl

<hr>

<center><H1>How can you win?</h1></center>

Just tell me in the comments below what your plan will be for this VPS. From the best comments (my personal opinion) a few winners will be chosen randomly.

**Rules**
- Your LET account must be created before september 2019
- No illegal stuff allowed
- 1 comment per member

Good luck everyone! Don't forget to party 🎉.
